fields.name: EUDAT Central Monitoring service
fields.description_external: CMON is the central monitoring system providing information about the availability and reliability of running services. This system is also responsible to check availability status against SLAs.

fields.name: B2SAFE
fields.description_external:
"B2SAFE is a robust, safe and highly available service which allows community and departmental repositories to implement data management policies on their research data across multiple administrative domains in a trustworthy manner.  
abstraction layer of large scale, heterogeneous data storages
guards against data loss in long-term archiving
allows to optimize access for users (e.g. from different regions)
brings data closer to facilities for compute-intensive analysis
"
fields.description_internal:
"B2SAFE is a robust, safe and highly available service which allows community and departmental repositories to implement data management policies on their research data across multiple administrative domains in a trustworthy manner.  
abstraction layer of large scale, heterogeneous data storages
guards against data loss in long-term archiving
allows to optimize access for users (e.g. from different regions)
brings data closer to facilities for compute-intensive analysis
"
fields.value_to_customer: Data replication  and safe storage  of your community data between geographically distributed centres

fields.name: B2HANDLE
fields.description_external: B2HANDLE is the distributed services managing the provisioning of PIDs and namespaces. EUDAT has adopted Handle-based persistent identifiers. The service for managing, storing and accessing PIDs is B2HANDLE.
fields.description_internal: The role of B2Handle is not entirely clear yet as it has so far not been an official EUDAT service offered to the outside yet.
fields.value_to_customer: long-lasting reference to a digital object stored at EUDAT.

fields.name: EUDAT Service Portfolio Management System
fields.description_external: The service portfolio Management system provides a interfaces  (API and a GUI) to the database that stores the service portfolio and service catalogue of EUDAT.  It facilitates insertion, storing and retrieval of the EUDAT service definitions. The service provides an RESTful API (JSON) for communication with 3rd party applications and a user friendly graphical user interface accessible via web browsers for the management of the service information by the different roles defined in the EUDAT Service Portfolio Management Process.
fields.description_internal: The service portfolio Management system provides a interfaces  (API and a GUI) to the database that stores the service portfolio and service catalogue of EUDAT.  It facilitates insertion, storing and retrieval of the EUDAT service definitions. The service provides an RESTful API (JSON) for communication with 3rd party applications and a user friendly graphical user interface accessible via web browsers for the management of the service information by the different roles defined in the EUDAT Service Portfolio Management Process.
fields.value_to_customer: Facilitate the Service Portfolio Management Process and provide a service catalogue to cutomers and users

fields.features_current: "Features:                                                                                                                                        - unified technical interface for registration of PIDs - operational management of PID namespaces (prefixes)
fields.features_future: "Features:                                                                                                                                        - unified technical interface for registration of PIDs - operational management of PID namespaces (prefixes)

fields.features_future: "CRUD access to the service portfolio database RESTful API (JSON) provision Read only GUI to the service catalogue/portfolio Role Management and Authentication GUI for inserting information to the portfolio"

fields.name: With Data Policy Manager
fields.description: If we consider the DPM as part of the B2SAFE, then it would be more clear to define an explicit option which include it

fields.name: Common Services Layer Interface (CSLI)
fields.description: (additionnal building block)  web-services and an HTTP API.

fields.name: B2SAFE core package
fields.description: I'm not sure if we want to consider this module as a separate component. Anyway it is deployed as separate rpm/deb package on top of iRODS: it contains a set of rules and a set of python scripts to enable the B2SAFE features.

fields.name: Data Policy Manager (B2Safe-DPM)
fields.description: The DPM interface allows users to create , list all the policies they are permitted to see and download policies. The users needs to be a valid community manager and needs to register with the DPM.
